definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 战俘依然受军法约束，以及军人守则的道德指导。

sentences.english: Rumor has it that you're very good attorney, formerly of the JAG core.
sentences.chinese: 据说你是个出色的律师，以前在军法署干。

sentences.english: Do not you know that you are under martial law?
sentences.chinese: 难道你不知道自己受军法约束？

sentences.english: His traitorous activity got him court-martialed.
sentences.chinese: 他的叛变活动使他受到军法审判。

definition: military orders are like mountains (idiom)/a military order must be obeyed
against orders/to disobey/to refuse to accept orders
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
to disrespect one's superiors/to offend one's elders
